author: Cristina Marcos
title: Several states have yet to issue stay-at-home orders
description: Twelve states have yet to issue stay-at-home orders to their residents despite a rising number of coronavirus cases and deaths across the country.The number of states that have yet to impose strict recomm...
content:
Twelve states have yet to issue stay-at-home orders to their residents despite a rising number of coronavirus cases and deaths across the country.
The number of states that have yet to impose strict recommendations on people to stay at home is steadily decre… [+7558 chars]
